sentences.en: After Don told me this, he spoke of his mother.
sentences.cn: 唐告诉我这件事后，就谈起了他的母亲。

sentences.en: Cross cleared his throat and spoke in low, polite tones.
sentences.cn: 克罗斯清了清嗓子，开始有礼貌地低声说话。

sentences.en: He looked vaguely around the room as he spoke, his mind elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 他边说话边茫然地打量着房间，心不在焉的样子。

sentences.en: He spoke no English and was completely silent during the visit.
sentences.cn: 他不会说英语，参观过程中一言未发。

sentences.en: He spoke to reporters on condition that he was not identified.
sentences.cn: 在不披露身份的条件下，他接受了记者的采访。

sentences.en: His mother leaned forward and spoke to him in urgent undertones.
sentences.cn: 他母亲身子前倾，小声而急切地跟他说话。

sentences.en: I spoke to the girl on the reception desk.
sentences.cn: 我跟服务台的女孩说了一下。

sentences.en: On their way back to Marseille they spoke very little.
sentences.cn: 返回马赛的路上，他们没怎么说话。

sentences.en: She looked him full in the face as she spoke.
sentences.cn: 她说话的时候直盯着他的脸。

sentences.en: She spoke haltingly of her deep upset and hurt.
sentences.cn: 她吞吞吐吐地诉说自己深深的苦恼及伤痛。

sentences.en: She spoke very slowly, weighing what she would say.
sentences.cn: 她讲话时斟酌再三，说得非常慢。

sentences.en: The dog's ears flattened slightly as Cook spoke his name.
sentences.cn: 库克叫这只狗的名字时，它的耳朵就会稍稍耷拉一下。

sentences.en: The President spoke of the treacherous intentions of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 总统谈及了敌人的奸诈用心。

sentences.en: The publicity-shy singer spoke frankly in his first interview in three years.
sentences.cn: 这位不喜欢抛头露面的歌手在3年来的首次访谈中畅所欲言。

sentences.en: When he spoke, his voice was hoarse and cracked.
sentences.cn: 他说话时声音沙哑颤抖。

words.tran_cn: 可说出口的；可以交谈的
演讲的；富于表情的，雄辩的
演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人

phrases.phrase: put a spoke in someone's wheel

trans.tran_cn: （车轮的）辐条，轮辐，破坏某人的计划，阻挠某人的行动
trans.tran_en: one of the thin metal bars which connect the outer ring of a wheel to the centre, especially on a bicycle

trans.tran_cn: 讲，谈( speak的过去式 )，说，演说，从某种观点来说
